<span class="a-declarative" data-action="sp-cc" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-sp-cc" data-sp-cc="{&quot;rejectAllAction&quot;:&quot;/sp/consent/v1/cookie/rejectall&quot;}"><form id="sp-cc" method="post" action="/cookieprefs?ref_=portal_banner_all"><input type="hidden" name="anti-csrftoken-a2z" value="gy13F9TIB48Aypthxq69j9H1bNER0xnt2/1Wdv+MwRRHAAAAAQAAAABiassgcmF3AAAAAGfFWqkEFVjyMh8T3F+olA=="/><div id="sp-cc-rejectall-container"></div><div class="sp-cc-text"><h4 class="a-spacing-small">Wählen Sie Ihre Cookie-Einstellungen</h4><p class="a-spacing-none"><p>Wir verwenden Cookies und ähnliche Tools, die erforderlich sind, um Ihnen Einkäufe zu ermöglichen, Ihr Einkaufserlebnis zu verbessern und unsere Dienste bereitzustellen. Dies wird auch in unseren <a href="/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201890250&amp;ref_=footer_cookies_notice">Cookie-Bestimmungen</a> beschrieben. Wir verwenden diese Cookies auch, um nachzuvollziehen, wie Kunden unsere Dienste nutzen (z. B. durch Messung der Websiteaufrufe), damit wir Verbesserungen vornehmen können.</p>
<p>Wenn Sie damit einverstanden sind, verwenden wir auch Cookies, um Ihr Einkaufserlebnis in den Stores zu ergänzen. Dies wird auch in unseren <a href="/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201890250&amp;ref_=footer_cookies_notice">Cookie-Bestimmungen</a> beschrieben. Dies beinhaltet die Verwendung von <a href="/cookieprefs/partners">Cookies von Erst- und Drittanbietern</a>, die Standardgeräteinformationen wie eine eindeutige Kennzeichnung speichern oder darauf zugreifen. Drittanbieter verwenden Cookies, um personalisierte Anzeigen zu schalten, deren Wirksamkeit zu messen, Erkenntnisse über Zielgruppen zu generieren und Produkte zu entwickeln und zu verbessern. Klicken Sie auf „Cookies anpassen“, um diese Cookies abzulehnen, detailliertere Einstellungen vorzunehmen oder mehr zu erfahren. Sie können Ihre Auswahl jederzeit ändern, indem Sie die <a href="/cookieprefs?ref_=ya_d_l_cookie_prefs">Cookie-Einstellungen</a>, wie in den Cookie-Bestimmungen beschrieben, aufrufen. Um mehr darüber zu erfahren, wie und zu welchen Zwecken Amazon personenbezogene Daten (z. B. den Bestellverlauf im Amazon Store) verwendet, lesen Sie bitte unsere <a href="/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201909010&ref_=footer_privacy">Datenschutzerklärung</a>.</p><div id="sp-cc-error" class="a-box a-alert-inline a-alert-inline-error aok-hidden a-spacing-top-base" role="alert"><div class="a-box-inner a-alert-container"><i class="a-icon a-icon-alert"></i><div class="a-alert-content">Leider ist ein Problem beim Speichern Ihrer Cookie-Einstellungen aufgetreten. Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut.</div></div></div></div><div class="sp-cc-buttons"><span class="a-button a-button-primary"><span class="a-button-inner"><input id="sp-cc-accept" tabindex="1" name="accept" class="a-button-input celwidget" type="submit" value="all"/><span class="a-button-text" aria-hidden="true">Cookies akzeptieren</span></span></span><span class="a-button a-button-base"><span class="a-button-inner"><a id="sp-cc-customize" tabindex="1" href="/cookieprefs?ref_=portal_banner_cpp" class="a-button-text a-text-center celwidget">Cookie-Einstellungen anpassen</a></span></span></div></form></span><script>P.register('sp-cc-ready');</script><!-- sp:end-feature:cookie-consent-banner -->

        var t = window.performance.timing;
        var now = + new Date();

          'networkLatency': (t.responseStart - t.fetchStart),
          'navFirstPaint': (now - t.responseStart),
          'NavStart': (now - window.ue_t0)
        };

      }
    }

  function initializeAutocomplete(jQuery) {
  var issInitObj = buildIssInitObject(opts, issOpts);
  $SearchJS.declare("canCreateAutocomplete", issInitObj);
} // END initializeAutocomplete
  function initSearchCsl(searchCSL, issInitObject) {
  searchCSL.init(
    opts.pageType,
    (window.ue && window.ue.rid) || opts.requestId
  );
  $SearchJS.declare("canCreateAutocomplete", issInitObject);
} // END initSearchCsl
  function createAutocomplete(issObject) {
  iss = new AutoComplete(issObject);

  $SearchJS.publish("search-js-autocomplete", iss);

  logMetrics();
} // END createAutocomplete
  function buildIssInitObject(opts, issOpts, isNewIss) {
    var issInitObj = {
        src: opts.host
      , sessionId: opts.sessionId
      , requestId: opts.requestId
      , mkt: opts.marketId
      , obfMkt: opts.obfuscatedMarketId
      , pageType: opts.pageType
      , language: opts.language
      , customerId: opts.customerId
      , fresh: opts.fresh
      , b2b: opts.b2b
      , aliases: opts.searchAliases
      , fb: issOpts.fallbackFlag
      , isDigitalFeaturesEnabled: issOpts.isDigitalFeaturesEnabled
      , isWayfindingEnabled: issOpts.isWayfindingEnabled
      , issPrimeEligible: issOpts.issPrimeEligible
      , deptText: issOpts.departmentText
      , sugText: issOpts.suggestionText
      , filterAliases: opts.filterAliases
      , biaWidgetUrl: opts.biaWidgetUrl
      , recentSearchesTreatment: issOpts.recentSearchesTreatment
      , authorSuggestionText: issOpts.authorSuggestionText
      , translatedStringsMap: issOpts.translatedStringsMap
      , biaTitleText: ""
      , biaPurchasedText: ""
      , biaViewAllText: ""
      , biaViewAllManageText: ""
      , biaAndText: ""
      , biaManageText: ""
      , biaWeblabTreatment: ""
      , issNavConfig: issOpts.issNavConfig
      , cf: issOpts.cf
      , ime: opts.isJpOrCn
      , mktid: opts.marketId
      , qs: opts.isJpOrCn
      , issCorpus: issOpts.issCorpus
      , deepNodeISS: {
          searchAliasAccessor: function($) {
            return (window.SearchPageAccess && window.SearchPageAccess.searchAlias()) ||
                   $('select.searchSelect').children().attr('data-root-alias');
          },
          searchAliasDisplayNameAccessor: function() {
            return (window.SearchPageAccess && window.SearchPageAccess.searchAliasDisplayName());
          }
        }
      , removeDeepNodeISS: issOpts.removeDeepNodeISS
      , trendingTreatment: issOpts.trendingTreatment
      , useAPIV2: issOpts.useAPIV2
      , opfSwitch: issOpts.opfSwitch
      , isISSDesktopRefactorEnabled: issOpts.isISSDesktopRefactorEnabled
      , useServiceHighlighting: issOpts.useServiceHighlighting
      , isInternal: issOpts.isInternal
      , isAPICachingDisabled: issOpts.isAPICachingDisabled
      , isBrowseNodeScopingEnabled: issOpts.isBrowseNodeScopingEnabled
      , isStorefrontTemplateEnabled: issOpts.isStorefrontTemplateEnabled
      , disableAutocompleteOnFocus: issOpts.disableAutocompleteOnFocus
    };
  
    // If we aren't using the new ISS then we need to add these properties
    
    if (!isNewIss) {
      issInitObj.dd = issOpts.dropdown; // The element with id searchDropdownBox doesn't exist in C.
      issInitObj.imeSpacing = issOpts.imeSpacing;
      issInitObj.isNavInline = 1;
      issInitObj.triggerISSOnClick = 0;
      issInitObj.sc = 1;
      issInitObj.np = issOpts.np;
    }
  
    return issInitObj;
  } // END buildIssInitObject
  function logMetrics() {
  if (typeof uet == 'function' && typeof uex == 'function') {
      uet('be', 'iss-init-pc',
          {
              wb: 1
          });
      uex('ld', 'iss-init-pc',
          {
              wb: 1
          });
  }
} // END logMetrics

<script type="text/javascript">

// =============================================================================
// Function Class: Show/Hide product promotions & special offers link
// =============================================================================

function showElement(id) {
  var elm = document.getElementById(id);
  if (elm) {
    elm.style.visibility = 'visible';
    if (elm.getAttribute('name') == 'heroQuickPromoDiv') {
      elm.style.display = 'block';
    }
  }
}
function hideElement(id) {
  var elm = document.getElementById(id);
  if (elm) {
    elm.style.visibility = 'hidden';
    if (elm.getAttribute('name') == 'heroQuickPromoDiv') {
      elm.style.display = 'none';
    }
  }
}
function showHideElement(h_id, div_id) {
  var hiddenTag = document.getElementById(h_id);
  if (hiddenTag) {
    showElement(div_id);
  } else {
    hideElement(div_id);
  }
}

    if(typeof P === 'object' && typeof P.when === 'function'){
    P.register("isLazyLoadWeblabEnabled", function(){
        var  isWeblabEnabled = 1;
        return isWeblabEnabled;
      });
    }

	window.isBowserFeatureCleanup = 0;
	
var touchDeviceDetected = false;



        P.register('sp.load.critical.js');
        P.when('atf').execute(function(){
          P.now('sp.load.js').execute(function(jsObj){
            if(!jsObj){
              P.declare('sp.load.js', {});
              if (window.ue && ue.count) {
                ue.count("jsLoadedAfterATFMarkedCount", 1);
              }
            }
          });
        });


var CSMReqs={af:{c:2,p:'atf'},cf:{c:2,p:'cf'},x1:{c:1,p:'x1'},x2:{c:1,p:'x2'}};
var prioritizeCriticalModules = true;
function setCSMReq(a){
    a=a.toLowerCase();
    var b=CSMReqs[a];
    if(b&&--b.c==0){
        if(typeof uet=='function'){uet(a); (a == 'af') && (typeof replaceImg === 'function') && replaceImg();};

        if (a == 'af' && prioritizeCriticalModules){
            var featureElements = document.getElementsByClassName('dp-cif');
            if(featureElements.length){
                var priorityModuleList = ["A","jQuery"];
                var moduleMap = {
                    'A' : 1,
                    'jQuery' : 1
                };
                for (var i = 0; i<featureElements.length; i++){
                    if(featureElements[i].dataset && featureElements[i].dataset.dpCriticalJsModules){
                        var criticalJsModules = JSON.parse(featureElements[i].dataset.dpCriticalJsModules);
                        if(criticalJsModules) {
                            criticalJsModules.forEach(function(criticalJsModule,index){
                                if (!moduleMap[criticalJsModule]){
                                    moduleMap[criticalJsModule] = 1;
                                    priorityModuleList.push(criticalJsModule);
                                }
                            });
                        }
                    } else if (typeof featureElements[i].dataset === 'undefined'){
                        var criticalJsModules = JSON.parse(featureElements[i].getAttribute('data-dp-critical-js-modules'));
                        if(criticalJsModules) {
                            criticalJsModules.forEach(function(criticalJsModule,index){
                                if (!moduleMap[criticalJsModule]){
                                    moduleMap[criticalJsModule] = 1;
                                    priorityModuleList.push(criticalJsModule);
                                }
                            });  
                        }   
                    }
                }

                if (P && P.setPriority && typeof P.setPriority === 'function' ) {
                    prioritizeCriticalModules = false;
                    P.setPriority(priorityModuleList);
                }
            }
        }
        if(typeof P != 'undefined'){
            P.register(b.p);
            if(a == 'af') {
                if(typeof uet === 'function') {
                    uet('bb', 'TwisterAUIWait', {wb: 1});
                }
            }
        };
    }
}

if(typeof P != 'undefined') {
    P.when('A').execute(function(A) {
        if(typeof uet === 'function') {
            uet('af', 'TwisterAUIWait', {wb: 1});
        }
    });
}

    marker=marker.toLowerCase();
    var b=CSMReqs[marker];
    if(b.c == 0){
        if(window.ue && typeof ue.tag === 'function') {
            ue.tag(customtag);
        }
    }
};

 <script type="text/javascript">
P.now().execute('dp-create-feature-interactive-api', function () {
    if (typeof uet === 'function'){
        uet('bb', 'clickToCI', {wb: 1});
    }
    var records = [], timeToInteractiveObj;
    window.markFeatureRender = function (fName, options) {
        updateFeatureList(fName, options, 'render');
    };
    window.markFeatureInteractive = function (fName, options) {
        updateFeatureList(fName, options, 'interactive');
    };
    function updateFeatureList(fName, options, type) {
        var record = {
            name: fName,
            options: options,
            type: type,
            timestamp: +new Date
        };
        if (timeToInteractiveObj) {
            timeToInteractiveObj.updateFeatures([record]);
        } else {
            records.push(record);
        }
    }
    P.when('dp-time-to-interactive').execute('dp-update-interactive-feature-list', function (obj) {
        timeToInteractiveObj = obj;
        if (records.length) {
            timeToInteractiveObj.updateFeatures(records);
        }
    });
}); </script>

  P.when('twister').execute(function(){});
  P.when('swfjs').execute(function(){});

    });
  }
</script>

<script>
(function() {
    var performance = window.performance;
    var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;
    if (!isApiSupported) {
        
        return;
    }

    var key = 'subnav-widget:1.0'
    performance.mark(key + ':be');

    var entry = key + ':clientBodyBeginToEnd';
    performance.measure(entry, key + ':bb', key + ':be');

    var entries = performance.getEntriesByName(entry);
    if (entries.length === 0) {
        return;
    }

    entries = entries.splice(entries.length - 1, 1);
    var duration = entries[0].duration;
    if (window.ue) {
        window.ue.count(entry, duration);
    }
})();
</script></div>

(function() {
    var performance = window.performance;
    var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;
    if (!isApiSupported) {
        
        return;
    }

    var key = 'content-grid-widget:1.0'
    performance.mark(key + ':be');

    var entry = key + ':clientBodyBeginToEnd';
    performance.measure(entry, key + ':bb', key + ':be');

    var entries = performance.getEntriesByName(entry);
    if (entries.length === 0) {
        return;
    }

    entries = entries.splice(entries.length - 1, 1);
    var duration = entries[0].duration;
    if (window.ue) {
        window.ue.count(entry, duration);

                        <a id="creturns-policy-anchor-text" href="javascript:void(0)" role="button" class="a-popover-trigger a-declarative a-inline-block"> KOSTENLOSE Rücksendungen <i class="a-icon a-icon-popover"></i></a> </span>

     cel_widget_id='free-returns-policy-popover-pc' class='celwidget'>
    <span class="a-text-bold">Diesen Artikel kostenlos zurücksenden</span>  <ul class="a-unordered-list a-nostyle a-vertical a-spacing-top-small">  <li><span class="a-list-item">Für die ausgewählte Versandadresse sind kostenlose Rücksendungen verfügbar. Sie können den Artikel aus beliebigem Grund versandkostenfrei zurücksenden, sofern er sich in einem neuem und unbenutztem Zustand befindet.</span></li>   <li><span class="a-list-item">  <a id="creturns-policy-url-text-pc" class="a-link-normal" href="/b?node=20788251031"> Informieren Sie sich über kostenlose Rücksendungen. </a>  </span></li>  </ul>   <div data-a-expander-name="creturnsHowToReturnExpander" class="a-row a-expander-container a-expander-inline-container"> <a data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-interaction-events="click" aria-expanded="false" role="button" href="javascript:void(0)" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-expander-header a-declarative a-expander-inline-header a-link-expander" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;&quot;}"><i class="a-icon a-icon-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">Wie sende ich den Artikel zurück?</span></a> <div id="creturnsHowToReturnExpanderContent" aria-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content a-expander-inline-content a-expander-inner" style="display:none">  <ol class="a-ordered-list a-vertical">  <li><span class="a-list-item">Rufen Sie Ihre Bestellungen auf und starten Sie die Rücksendung.</span></li>  <li><span class="a-list-item">Wählen Sie die Rückgabemethode</span></li>  <li><span class="a-list-item">Und absenden!</span></li>  </ol>  </div> </div>  </div> </div>  </span> </span>        </div>                                </div>

                                               <div id="deliveryBlock_feature_div" class="celwidget" data-feature-name="deliveryBlock">
                             <div id="deliveryBlockMessage" class="a-section">  <div id="mir-layout-DELIVERY_BLOCK"><div class="a-spacing-base" id="mir-layout-DELIVERY_BLOCK-slot-NO_PROMISE_UPSELL_MESSAGE"></div><div class="a-spacing-base" id="mir-layout-DELIVERY_BLOCK-slot-PRIMARY_DELIVERY_MESSAGE_LARGE"><span data-csa-c-type="element" data-csa-c-content-id="DEXUnifiedCXPDM" data-csa-c-delivery-price="KOSTENLOSE" data-csa-c-value-proposition="" data-csa-c-delivery-type="Lieferung" data-csa-c-delivery-time="Montag, 2. Mai" data-csa-c-delivery-condition="" data-csa-c-pickup-location="" data-csa-c-distance="" data-csa-c-delivery-cutoff="" data-csa-c-mir-view="CONSOLIDATED_CX" data-csa-c-mir-type="DELIVERY" data-csa-c-mir-sub-type="" data-csa-c-mir-variant="DEFAULT" data-csa-c-delivery-benefit-program-id="cfs"> <a class="a-link-normal" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=GZXW7X6AKTHNUP6H">KOSTENLOSE Lieferung</a> <span class="a-text-bold">Montag, 2. Mai</span> </span></div><div class="a-spacing-base" id="mir-layout-DELIVERY_BLOCK-slot-CORE_FREE_SHIPPING_SUPPLEMENTARY_MESSAGE"></div><div class="a-spacing-base" id="mir-layout-DELIVERY_BLOCK-slot-SECONDARY_DELIVERY_MESSAGE_LARGE"><span data-csa-c-type="element" data-csa-c-content-id="DEXUnifiedCXSDM" data-csa-c-delivery-price="schnellste" data-csa-c-value-proposition="" data-csa-c-delivery-type="Lieferung" data-csa-c-delivery-time="Samstag, 30. April" data-csa-c-delivery-condition="" data-csa-c-pickup-location="" data-csa-c-distance="" data-csa-c-delivery-cutoff="Bestellung innerhalb 4 Stdn. 46 Min." data-csa-c-mir-view="CONSOLIDATED_CX" data-csa-c-mir-type="DELIVERY" data-csa-c-mir-sub-type="" data-csa-c-mir-variant="DEFAULT" data-csa-c-delivery-benefit-program-id="dame_deliverable"> Oder schnellste Lieferung <span class="a-text-bold">Samstag, 30. April</span>. Bestellung innerhalb <span id="ftCountdown" class="ftCountdownClass a-color-success">4 Stdn. 46 Min.</span> </span></div><div class="a-spacing-base" id="mir-layout-DELIVERY_BLOCK-slot-EXTENDED_DELIVERY_PROMISE_MESSAGE"></div><div class="a-spacing-base" id="mir-layout-DELIVERY_BLOCK-slot-HOLIDAY_DELIVERY_MESSAGE"></div><div class="a-spacing-base" id="mir-layout-DELIVERY_BLOCK-slot-SUPPLEMENTAL_DELIVERY_MESSAGE"></div></div> </div>       <input type="hidden" id="deliveryBlockSelectAsin" value="B084DWG2VQ"/>
  <input type="hidden" id="deliveryBlockSelectMerchant" value="A3JWKAKR8XB7XF"/>
 <script type="text/javascript">
    P.when("A", "jQuery").execute(function(A, $) {
        $("#selectQuantity [name='quantity'], #mobileQuantityDropDown").live("change", function (event) {

            if (event.updateDeliveryBlockOnQuantityChange) {
                return;
            }
            event.updateDeliveryBlockOnQuantityChange = 1;

            // "#buybox" is included in this list because if there is no accordion row, then it is a single-offer layout
            var accordionRow = $(this).closest('[id$="AccordionRow"], #buybox');

            var quantity = $(this).val();
            var asin = accordionRow.find("#deliveryBlockSelectAsin").val();
            var merchantId = accordionRow.find("#deliveryBlockSelectMerchant").val();

            if (!asin || !merchantId) {
                return;
            }

            var params = [];

            params.push("asin=" + asin);
            params.push("quantity=" + quantity);
            params.push("exclusiveMerchantId=" + merchantId);
            params.push("merchantId=" + merchantId);
            params.push("clientId=retailwebsite");
            params.push("deviceType=web");
            params.push("showFeatures=deliveryBlock");
            params.push("ie=UTF8");
            params.push("experienceId=deliveryBlockQuantityRefreshAjaxExperience");

            $.ajax({
                type: "GET",
                url: "/gp/product/ajax?",
                contentType: 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8',
                data: params.join('&'),
                accordionRow: accordionRow,
                dataType: "html",
                success: function(objResponse) {
                    if (objResponse != null && objResponse != "") {
                        accordionRow.find("#deliveryBlockMessage").replaceWith(objResponse);
                    }
                }
            });

            return;
        });
    });
</script>                             </div>

        P.when('cf').execute(function executeTurboAssetsLoadTriggerEvent() {
            P.now('turbo-checkout-assets-load-trigger').execute(function(assetsLoadTrigger) {

                    logTurboCounter("AssetTriggerDedupe");
                    return;

                try {

                    logTurboCounter('AssetTrigger');
                } catch (e) {

            });

            function logTurboCounter(name) {
                var counter = 'turboCheckout' + name;
                if (window.ue && window.ue.count) {
                    window.ue.count(counter, 1);
                }
            }
        });

            <div class="a-section a-padding-base">   <div class="a-row a-spacing-base"> <span class="a-text-bold">Ihre Transaktion ist sicher.</span> </div> <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro"> <span>Der sorgfältige Umgang mit Ihren persönlichen Informationen ist uns sehr wichtig.     <div class="a-section a-padding-base">  <div class="a-row a-spacing-base"> <span class="a-text-bold">Was ist Produkt-Support?</span> </div>  <div class="a-row a-spacing-micro"> Für den Fall, dass Ihr Produkt nicht wie erwartet funktioniert oder Sie möchten, dass jemand Sie durch die Einrichtung führt, bietet Amazon bei berechtigten Einkäufen für bis zu 2 Jahre kostenlosen Produktsupport per Telefon. <br/> Um auf diese Option zuzugreifen, gehen Sie zu „Meine Bestellungen“ und wählen Sie „Produktsupport abrufen“. </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> </div>                             </div>

                           <span id="tanookiWidgetState" data-tanooki-widget-state="{&quot;asin&quot;:&quot;B084DWG2VQ&quot;,&quot;deviceType&quot;:&quot;web&quot;,&quot;productGroup&quot;:&quot;gl_digital_products_3&quot;,&quot;tanookiTitle&quot;:&quot;Amazon Trade-In&quot;}"></span>
          <div class="a-section a-spacing-medium tradein-instant-savings-launch-wrapper"> <span class="a-declarative" data-action="redirect-to-login" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-redirect-to-login" data-redirect-to-login="{}" id="tradeInLaunchAction"> <span id="tradeInLauncher" class="a-button a-button-base tradein-instant-savings-launch-button"><span class="a-button-inner"><button id="tradeInLauncher-announce" class="a-button-text" type="button"> <span class="a-text-bold">  25% sparen mit Trade-In </span> </button></span></span> </span> </div>                            </div>

                              <div id="bbop_feature_div" class="celwidget" data-feature-name="bbop">
                                      <style type="text/css">
#bbop-sbbop-container {
  margin-bottom: 0px;
}
</style>

 <div id="bbop-sbbop-container" class="a-section">  <div id="sbbop-popover-header" class="a-section a-hidden"> <div class="a-box a-alert-inline a-alert-inline-success">
            <div class="a-box-inner a-alert-container">
                <i class="a-icon a-icon-alert"></i>
                <div class="a-color-base">
                    Echo Dot (4. Generation) ... <product name> ist in Ihrem Einkaufwagen hinzugefügt worden  </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div> </div> <script type="text/javascript">


if( window.P ){
    P.when("A", "jQuery").execute(function(A, $) {

        
        var bbopData = {
            "interstitialEnabled":"",
            "bbopEnabled":"true",
            "sbbopEnabled":"true",
            "productAsin":"B084DWG2VQ",
            "productMerchantID":"A3JWKAKR8XB7XF",
            "bbopRuleID":"Acquisition_AddToCart_PrimeBasicFreeTrialUpsellEligible",
            "bbopPreorder":"false",
            "bbopReleaseDateDeliveryEligibility":"false",
            "bbopDeliveryOptions":"[]",
            "deliveryCountryCode":"DE",
            "sbbopRuleID":"Acquisition_AddToCart_PrimeBasicFreeTrialUpsellEligible",
            "sbbopEventID":"106",
            "sbbopMetricsScope":"surpriseBBOP",
        };

        
        var emptyBbopContainer = $('#bbop-sbbop-container').html();

        
        var addToCartButtonName = $('#add-to-cart-button').attr('name');

        var isTrue = function(strBoolean) {
            return strBoolean === "true";
        }

        

        function getQueryParameterByName(name) {
            name = name.replace(/[\[]/, "\\[").replace(/[\]]/, "\\]");

            var regex = new RegExp("[\\?&]" + name + "=([^&#]*)"),
                results = regex.exec(location.search);

            return results == null ? "" : decodeURIComponent(results[1].replace(/\+/g, " "));
        }

        
        var hidden, visibilityChange;
        if (typeof document.hidden !== "undefined") { 
            hidden = "hidden";
            visibilityChange = "visibilitychange";
        } else if (typeof document.mozHidden !== "undefined") {
            hidden = "mozHidden";
            visibilityChange = "mozvisibilitychange";
        } else if (typeof document.msHidden !== "undefined") {
            hidden = "msHidden";
            visibilityChange = "msvisibilitychange";
        } else if (typeof document.webkitHidden !== "undefined") {
            hidden = "webkitHidden";
            visibilityChange = "webkitvisibilitychange";
        }

         
        var loadFeatures = function(featureData) {
            if(!featureData || !isTrue(featureData["bbopEnabled"])) {
                return;
            }
            
            var $container = $("#bbop-sbbop-container");

            var data = {
                "ASIN" : featureData["productAsin"],
                "merchantID" : featureData["productMerchantID"],
                "bbopruleID" : featureData["bbopRuleID"],
                "sbbopruleID" : featureData["sbbopRuleID"],
                "deliveryOptions" : featureData["bbopDeliveryOptions"],
                "preorder" : featureData["bbopPreorder"],
                "releaseDateDeliveryEligible" : featureData["bbopReleaseDateDeliveryEligibility"],
                "deliveryCountryCode" : featureData["deliveryCountryCode"],
            };
            var scope = "bbopAjaxCall";
            if(typeof uet === 'function') {
                uet('bb', scope, {wb: 1});
            }

              
                $.get("/hz/primeacquisition/bbopupsellcontentslot", data, function(result) {
                      
                            $container.append(result.content);
                         
                    if(typeof uet === 'function' && typeof uex === 'function') {
                        
                        uet( "cf", scope, {wb: 1} );
                        uex( "ld", scope, {wb: 1} );
                    }

                    if (isTrue(getQueryParameterByName("checkBBOP"))) {
                        P.when("a-modal", "ready").execute(function(modal) {
                            $('#bbop-check-box').click();
                        });
                    }

                    
                    if((isTrue(featureData["sbbopEnabled"])) && (document.getElementById("smartShelfSecondaryPanel_feature_div") == null) ) {
                        loadSBBOP(featureData);
                    }
                });
              

            var loadSBBOP = function(sbbopData) {
                if (window.sbbopLoaded === undefined) {
                    window.sbbopLoaded = false;
                }

                P.when("a-modal", "ready").execute(function(modal) {
                    if(!window.sbbopLoaded){
                        var sbbop_modal = createModal(modal);

                        if (sbbop_modal !== undefined) {
                            $(document.body).delegate('#add-to-cart-button','click.sbbop', function(event){
                                $(document.body).undelegate('#add-to-cart-button','click.sbbop');

                                var $sbbop = $("#sbbop-container"),
                                    $sbbopContent = $sbbop.find("#sbbop-popover-content"),
                                    $sbbopHeader = $container.find("#sbbop-popover-header"),
                                    $sbbopFooter = $sbbop.find("#sbbop-popover-footer"),
                                    isAsinizationCase = $sbbop.find(".is-sbbop-asinization-usecase").length > 0,
                                    $bbopCheckbox = $('#bbop-check-box'),
                                    $atcButton = $('#add-to-cart-button'),
                                    atcName = $atcButton.attr("name"),
                                    hasSingleYesButton = ($('#sbbop-yes-button').length === 1),
                                    hasSingleNoButton  = ($('#sbbop-no-button').length === 1),
                                    validAtcButton = ($atcButton.length === 1 && atcName != "submit.add-to-cart-prime-buy-box.x"),
                                    validSbbopContent = ($sbbopContent.length === 1 && $sbbopHeader.length === 1 && $sbbopFooter.length === 1),
                                    validSbbopButtons = (hasSingleYesButton && hasSingleNoButton),
                                    bbopIsNotChecked = !$bbopCheckbox.is(":checked");

                                if (validAtcButton && validSbbopContent && validSbbopButtons && bbopIsNotChecked) {
                                    $atcButton.bind('click.sbbop', function(){return false;});  
                                    var metricsScope = sbbopData["sbbopMetricsScope"];
                                    $(document.body).delegate("#sbbop-yes-button", "click", function(event){
                                        if(isAsinizationCase){
                                            $bbopCheckbox.prop("checked",true);
                                            logMetric("CSM_prime_surprise_BBOP_yes_button_HO", metricsScope);
                                        }
                                        else {
                                            $atcButton.attr("name", "submit.add-to-cart-prime-buy-box.x");
                                            logMetric("CSM_prime_surprise_BBOP_yes_button", metricsScope);
                                        }
                                        safeATCClick(metricsScope);
                                    });

                                    $(document.body).delegate("#sbbop-no-button", "click", function(event){
                                        if(isAsinizationCase) {
                                            logMetric("CSM_prime_surprise_BBOP_no_button_HO", metricsScope);
                                        }
                                        else {
                                            logMetric("CSM_prime_surprise_BBOP_no_button", metricsScope);
                                        }
                                        safeATCClick(metricsScope);
                                    });

                                    
                                    $(document.body).delegate(".a-popover", "keydown", function(event){
                                        if(event.keyCode == "27"){
                                            event.preventDefault();
                                        }
                                    });

                                    A.on("a:popover:ajaxFail:sbbop_modal", function(){
                                        safeATCClick(metricsScope);
                                    });
                                    A.on("a:popover:hide:sbbop_modal", function(){
                                        if(isAsinizationCase) {
                                            logMetric("CSM_prime_surprise_BBOP_close_button_HO", metricsScope);
                                        }
                                        else {
                                            logMetric("CSM_prime_surprise_BBOP_close_button", metricsScope);
                                        }
                                        safeATCClick(metricsScope);
                                    });
                                    A.on("a:popover:beforeShow:sbbop_modal", function(){
                                        setEventEmbu(sbbopData["sbbopEventID"]);
                                    });

                                    sbbop_modal.show();
                                    if(isAsinizationCase) {
                                        logMetric("CSM_prime_surprise_BBOP_presentation_HO", metricsScope);
                                    }
                                    else {
                                        logMetric("CSM_prime_surprise_BBOP_presentation", metricsScope);
                                    }
                                    return false;
                                }
                            });
                        }
                        window.sbbopLoaded = true;
                    }
                });
            };

            var createModal = function(modal) {
                var $sbbop = $("#sbbop-container"),
                    $sbbopContent = $sbbop.find("#sbbop-popover-content"),
                    $sbbopHeader = $container.find("#sbbop-popover-header"),
                    $sbbopFooter = $sbbop.find("#sbbop-popover-footer");

                if($sbbopContent.length === 1 && $sbbopHeader.length === 1 && $sbbopFooter.length === 1){
                    sbbopWidth = parseInt(($sbbop.find("#sbbop-popover")).attr("popover-width"), 10);

                    return modal.create($sbbop, {
                        "inlineContent": $sbbopContent.html(),
                        "header": $sbbopHeader.html(),
                        "footer": $sbbopFooter.html(),
                        "width": sbbopWidth,
                        "activate": "onclick",
                        "name": "sbbop_modal"
                    });
                }
                return undefined;
            }

            var logMetric = function(customTag, metricsScop){
                if(window.ue && ue.tag) {
                    ue.tag(customTag, metricsScop);
                }
            };

            var postBackMetrics = function(metricsScope){
                if (window.ue){
                    uex("ld", metricsScope);
                }
            };

            var setEventEmbu = function(eventId){
                var eventData = { "eventCode" : eventId };
                $.get("/gp/prime/utility/record-embu-event.html", eventData);
            };

            var safeATCClick = function(metricsScope) {
                postBackMetrics(metricsScope);                     
                $('#add-to-cart-button').unbind('click.sbbop')     
                    .click()                                       
                    .bind('click.sbbop',function(){return false}); 
            };
        }

        
        var handleVisibilityChange = function() {
            if (!document[hidden]) {
                
                document.removeEventListener(visibilityChange, handleVisibilityChange);
                loadFeatures(bbopData);
            }
        }

        if (typeof document.addEventListener === "undefined" ||
            typeof document[hidden] === "undefined" || !document[hidden]) {
            
            loadFeatures(bbopData);
        } else {
            
            document.addEventListener(visibilityChange, handleVisibilityChange);
        }
    });
}
</script>

   <div id="preRegistration-container" class="a-section a-spacing-mini inline-popup-link"> <span class="a-declarative" data-action="mako-preReg-declarative" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-mako-preReg-declarative" data-mako-preReg-declarative="{}"> <div data-a-input-name="account-linking" class="a-checkbox pre-reg-checkbox-option"><label for="account-linking"><input id="account-linking" type="checkbox" name="account-linking" value="yes" checked/><i class="a-icon a-icon-checkbox"></i><span class="a-label a-checkbox-label"> <span id="preRegCheckboxText" class="mako-pre-reg-checkbox-text">  Gerät mit Ihrem Amazon-Konto verknüpfen   für eine vereinfachte Einrichtung.   </span> <span class="a-declarative" data-action="preReg-popup-window" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-preReg-popup-window" data-preReg-popup-window="{&quot;windowName&quot;:&quot;PreRegistration&quot;,&quot;windowOptions&quot;:&quot;width=800,height=600,scrollbars=yes&quot;}"> <span class="a-declarative" data-action="a-popover" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-popover" data-a-popover="{&quot;name&quot;:&quot;preRegistrationPopoverContent&quot;,&quot;position&quot;:&quot;triggerBottom&quot;}"> <a href="javascript:void(0)" role="button" class="a-popover-trigger a-declarative"> <a class="a-link-normal gifting-option-popup-link" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/?nodeId=GMPKVYDBR223TRPY&amp;pop-up=1"> Warum ist das wichtig? </a> <i class="a-icon a-icon-popover"></i></a> </span> <div class="a-popover-preload" id="a-popover-preRegistrationPopoverContent"> <p> Gerät mit Ihrem Amazon-Konto verbinden und einfache WLAN-Einrichtung starten. </p> <p> Falls Sie bereits über ein Amazon-Gerät verfügen, das mit Ihrem WLAN verbunden ist, wird sich das neue Gerät automatisch mit Ihrem WLAN verbinden und die Einrichtung abschließen. </p> <a class="a-link-normal" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/?nodeId=GMPKVYDBR223TRPY&amp;pop-up=1"> Mehr über die einfache Amazon WLAN-Einrichtung erfahren </a> </div> </span> </span></label></div> </span> </div> <div id="preRegistration-alert-container" class="a-section a-spacing-mini"> <div id="preregistrationGiftingAlert" class="a-box a-alert-inline a-alert-inline-info aok-hidden" aria-live="polite" aria-atomic="true"><div class="a-box-inner a-alert-container"><i class="a-icon a-icon-alert"></i><div class="a-alert-content"> Dies wurde als Geschenk markiert und wird nicht in Ihrem Amazon-Konto registriert. Um eine Verbindung herzustellen, entfernen Sie den Haken bei „Dies ist ein Geschenk“. </div></div></div> <div id="preregistrationQuantityAlert" class="a-box a-alert-inline a-alert-inline-info aok-hidden" aria-live="polite" aria-atomic="true"><div class="a-box-inner a-alert-container"><i class="a-icon a-icon-alert"></i><div class="a-alert-content"> Verbindung mit einem Amazon-Konto ist für dieses Gerät bei einer Bestellung von mehr als $PREREG_MAX_QUANTITY nicht verfügbar. </div></div></div> </div>   <script type="text/javascript">(function(f) {var _np=(window.P._namespace("PreRegistration"));if(_np.guardFatal){_np.guardFatal(f)(_np);}else{f(_np);}}(function(P) {
        P.when("PreRegistration.Controller", "ready").execute(function(PreRegistrationController) {

        PreRegistrationController.getInstance(controllerDataJson);
        });

    <script>
(function() {
var performance = window.performance;
var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;

if (isApiSupported) {
    performance.mark('mars-accessory-upsell:1.0' + ':bb');
} else if (window.ue) {
    window.ue.count('mars:missing-performance-api', 1);
}
})();
</script>

<span id="popoverABBUpsellContextAJAX"></span>
<script>
    var popoverAJAXParams = {
        url: "https://api-amazondevices.amazon.de/mars/widget/accessory-upsell-product-view/1.0/get-product-view?asinList=B09VT25KB8&asinList=B08NVRPQNH&asinList=B08D7LDQTQ&asinList=B08NVVRCTM&asinList=B082YTW968&asinList=B099NPC5K5",
    };
    P.when("A",'ready').execute(function(A) {
        var $ = A.$;
        $.get(popoverAJAXParams.url)
            .done(function (data) {
                $('#popoverABBUpsellContextAJAX').html(data);
            })
            .fail(function (jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) {
                // filter out js fatal caused by Unknow error, when such fatal occurs,
                // jqXHR = {"readyState":0,"responseText":"","status":0,"statusText":"error"}
                if (jqXHR.readyState !== 0 && jqXHR.status !== 0 && jqXHR.status !== 400) {
                    P.logError(new Error(errorThrown), 'MARS AJAX call failed to load product view ' +  textStatus + '.Fatal' , 'FATAL');
                }
            });
    });

</script>

        </div>
        

        

         
            
            
                
                <div class="a-section abb-product-feature-bullets">
                    <ul>
                        
                            
                                <li>Einfache Einrichtung per Bluetooth: Hue Lampe eindrehen, Hue Bluetooth App downloaden und bis zu 10 Lampen in einem Raum steuern</li>
                            
                        
                            
                                <li>Für das volle Smart Home Erlebnis im gesamten Zuhause: Erweitern Sie Ihr System mit der Hue Bridge (separat erhältlich) und entdecken Sie viele weitere Funktionen</li>
                            
                        
                            
                                <li>Personalisierte Beleuchtung: Erleben Sie mit Hue Lampen angenehmes, warmweißes Licht und verleihen Sie ihrem Zuhause durch stufenloses Dimmen das perfekte Ambiente</li>
                            
                        
                            
                                <li>Kreieren Sie Ihr individuelles Licht für jeden Anlass: Ob Dinnerparty oder entspannten Tagesausklang, mit Philips Hue schaffen Sie immer die perfekte Raumatmosphäre</li>
                            
                        
                            
                                <li>Die intelligente Bluetooth-Beleuchtung von Philips Hue ist kompatibel mit dem Amazon Echo Dot (3.Generation), Echo Plus und Echo Show (2.Generation)</li>
                            
                        
                    </ul>
                </div>

<script>
(function() {
    var performance = window.performance;
    var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;
    if (!isApiSupported) {
        
        return;
    }

    var key = 'mars-accessory-upsell:1.0'
    performance.mark(key + ':be');

    var entry = key + ':clientBodyBeginToEnd';
    performance.measure(entry, key + ':bb', key + ':be');

    var entries = performance.getEntriesByName(entry);
    if (entries.length === 0) {
        return;
    }

    entries = entries.splice(entries.length - 1, 1);
    var duration = entries[0].duration;
    if (window.ue) {
        window.ue.count(entry, duration);
    }
})();
</script></div>

    function atwlEarlyClick(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        if (window.atwlLoaded) {
            return; //if JS is loaded then we can ignore the early click case
        }
        var ADD_TO_LIST_FROM_DETAIL_PAGE_VENDOR_ID = "website.wishlist.detail.add.earlyclick";

        var paramMap = {
            "asin": "B084DWG2VQ",
            "vendorId": ADD_TO_LIST_FROM_DETAIL_PAGE_VENDOR_ID,
            "isAjax": "false"
        }

        var url = "/hz/wishlist/additemtolist?ie=UTF8";

        for (var param in paramMap) {
            url += "&" + param + "=" + paramMap[param];
        }
        var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
        xhr.open("POST", url, false);
        xhr.setRequestHeader("anti-csrftoken-a2z", "g9yvgY6ulQYaXBbgygGeDxuEISSiPUo75xp4joSo4TpqAAAAAQAAAABiassgcmF3AAAAAHuL9oHQYR32uqP6iUf8kQ==");

            window.location = xhr.responseURL; //Needed to force a redirect; not supported on IE!
        }
        xhr.send();
    }

   <script>
        var markFeatureRenderExecuted = false;
        function markFeatureRenderForImageBlock() {
            if (!markFeatureRenderExecuted) {
                markFeatureRenderExecuted = true;
                P.now().execute('dp-mark-imageblock',function(){
                    var options = {
                        hasComponents: true,
                        components: [{
                            name: 'mainimage'
                        }]
                    };
                    if (typeof window.markFeatureRender === 'function') {
                        window.markFeatureRender('imageblock',options);
                    }
                });
            }
        }
    </script>
 <!-- Append onload function to stretch image on load to avoid flicker when transitioning from low res image from Mason to large image variant in desktop -->
<!-- any change in onload function requires a corresponding change in Mason to allow it pass in /mason/amazon-family/gp/product/features/embed-features.mi -->

    </span> </span></li>    <li id="noFlashContent" class="noFlash a-hidden"><span class="a-list-item"> Herunterladen, um dieses Videos wiederzugeben  <a class="a-link-normal" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer noopener" href="https://get.adobe.com/flashplayer"> Flash Player <span class="swSprite s_extLink"></span> </a> </span></li>  </ul>   <script type="text/javascript">
    var mainImgContainer = document.getElementById("main-image-container");
    var landingImage = document.getElementById("landingImage");
    var imgWrapperDiv = document.getElementById("imgTagWrapperId");
    
    var containerWidth = mainImgContainer.offsetWidth;
    var holderRatio = 1.0;
    var shouldAutoPlay = false;
    var containerHeight = containerWidth/holderRatio;
    containerHeight = Math.min(containerHeight, 700);

    var dynamicImageMaxHeight = 679 ;
    var dynamicImageMaxWidth = 679 ;
    
    dynamicImageMaxHeight = landingImage.naturalHeight;
    dynamicImageMaxWidth = landingImage.naturalWidth;
    
    var aspectRatio = dynamicImageMaxWidth/dynamicImageMaxHeight;

    var imageMaxHeight = containerHeight;
    var imageMaxWidth = containerWidth;

    if(!shouldAutoPlay && !true) {
        imageMaxHeight = Math.min(imageMaxHeight, dynamicImageMaxHeight);
        imageMaxWidth = Math.min(imageMaxWidth, dynamicImageMaxWidth);
    }

    
    var useImageBlockLeftColCentering = false;
    var rightMargin = 40;

    if(typeof useImageBlockLeftColCentering !== "undefined" && useImageBlockLeftColCentering){
        mainImgContainer.style.marginRight = rightMargin + "px";
    }
    mainImgContainer.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
    
    var imageMaxWidthBasedOnHeight = imageMaxHeight * aspectRatio;
    var imageMaxHeightBasedOnWidth = imageMaxWidth / aspectRatio;
    imageMaxHeight = Math.min(imageMaxHeight, imageMaxHeightBasedOnWidth);
    imageMaxWidth = Math.min(imageMaxWidth, imageMaxWidthBasedOnHeight);

    if(imgWrapperDiv){
        imgWrapperDiv.style.height = containerHeight + "px";
    }

    if(landingImage){
        landingImage.style.maxHeight = imageMaxHeight + "px";
        landingImage.style.maxWidth = imageMaxWidth + "px";
    }

    if(shouldAutoPlay){
        if(landingImage){
            landingImage.style.height = imageMaxHeight + "px";
            landingImage.style.width  = imageMaxWidth + "px";
        }
    }

</script>

<script>
(function() {
    var performance = window.performance;
    var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;
    if (!isApiSupported) {
        
        return;
    }

    var key = 'interact-with-alexa:1.0'
    performance.mark(key + ':be');

    var entry = key + ':clientBodyBeginToEnd';
    performance.measure(entry, key + ':bb', key + ':be');

    var entries = performance.getEntriesByName(entry);
    if (entries.length === 0) {
        return;
    }

    entries = entries.splice(entries.length - 1, 1);
    var duration = entries[0].duration;
    if (window.ue) {
        window.ue.count(entry, duration);
    }
})();
</script></div>

<script>
(function() {
    var performance = window.performance;
    var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;
    if (!isApiSupported) {
        
        return;
    }

    var key = 'content-grid-widget:1.0'
    performance.mark(key + ':be');

    var entry = key + ':clientBodyBeginToEnd';
    performance.measure(entry, key + ':bb', key + ':be');

    var entries = performance.getEntriesByName(entry);
    if (entries.length === 0) {
        return;
    }

    entries = entries.splice(entries.length - 1, 1);
    var duration = entries[0].duration;
    if (window.ue) {
        window.ue.count(entry, duration);
    }
})();

    }

        width: 60px;
        background: rgba(0,0,0,.075);
    }

        white-space: nowrap;
    }
</style>

    P.when("PickAVersionAjax.Controller").execute(function(PickAVersionAjaxController) {
    PickAVersionAjaxController.init({"url":"https://api-amazondevices.amazon.de/mars/widget/pick-a-version-widget-ajax/1.0/ajax-view/113790920?mainProduct\u003dB084DWG2VQ","asin":"B084DWG2VQ","marketplaceId":"A1PA6795UKMFR9","language":"de-DE","header":"Versionen von Echo Dot","cacheKey":"113790920"});

<script>
(function() {
    var performance = window.performance;
    var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;
    if (!isApiSupported) {
        
        return;
    }

    var key = 'pick-a-version-widget:1.0'
    performance.mark(key + ':be');

    var entry = key + ':clientBodyBeginToEnd';
    performance.measure(entry, key + ':bb', key + ':be');

    var entries = performance.getEntriesByName(entry);
    if (entries.length === 0) {
        return;
    }

    entries = entries.splice(entries.length - 1, 1);
    var duration = entries[0].duration;
    if (window.ue) {
        window.ue.count(entry, duration);
    }
})();
</script></div>

    var DCContainer = document.getElementById('twister-plus-inline-twister');
    if (DCContainer) {
        var DCDimLists = DCContainer.querySelectorAll('.dimension-values-list');
        for (var i = 0; i < DCDimLists.length; i++) {

</script>    <script type="text/javascript">
    P.register('twister-plus-desktop-configurator-mark-render', function(){
        if (typeof window.markFeatureRender === 'function') {
            var nonSingletonDimensionLength =2;
            var options = {};
            if (nonSingletonDimensionLength === 0) {
                options.isInteractive = false;
            } else {
                var twisterComponent = "twister-desktopConfigurator";
                options.hasComponents = true;
                options.components = [{
                    name: twisterComponent
                }];
            }
            window.markFeatureRender('twister', options);
        }
    });

<script>
(function() {
    var performance = window.performance;
    var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;
    if (!isApiSupported) {
        
        return;
    }

    var key = 'content-grid-widget:1.0'
    performance.mark(key + ':be');

    var entry = key + ':clientBodyBeginToEnd';
    performance.measure(entry, key + ':bb', key + ':be');

    var entries = performance.getEntriesByName(entry);
    if (entries.length === 0) {
        return;
    }

    entries = entries.splice(entries.length - 1, 1);
    var duration = entries[0].duration;
    if (window.ue) {
        window.ue.count(entry, duration);
    }
})();
</script></div>

<script>
(function() {
    var performance = window.performance;
    var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;
    if (!isApiSupported) {
        
        return;
    }

    var key = 'jump-links-widget:1.0'
    performance.mark(key + ':be');

    var entry = key + ':clientBodyBeginToEnd';
    performance.measure(entry, key + ':bb', key + ':be');

    var entries = performance.getEntriesByName(entry);
    if (entries.length === 0) {
        return;
    }

    entries = entries.splice(entries.length - 1, 1);
    var duration = entries[0].duration;
    if (window.ue) {
        window.ue.count(entry, duration);
    }
})();
</script></div>

<script>
(function() {
    var performance = window.performance;
    var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;
    if (!isApiSupported) {
        
        return;
    }

    var key = 'family-stripe-widget:1.0'
    performance.mark(key + ':be');

    var entry = key + ':clientBodyBeginToEnd';
    performance.measure(entry, key + ':bb', key + ':be');

    var entries = performance.getEntriesByName(entry);
    if (entries.length === 0) {
        return;
    }

    entries = entries.splice(entries.length - 1, 1);
    var duration = entries[0].duration;
    if (window.ue) {
        window.ue.count(entry, duration);
    }
})();
</script></div>

<script>
(function() {
var performance = window.performance;
var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;

if (isApiSupported) {
    performance.mark('content-grid-widget:1.0' + ':bb');
} else if (window.ue) {
    window.ue.count('mars:missing-performance-api', 1);
}
})();
</script>

<p>Alexa und Echo-Geräte wurden mit Datenschutzmaßnahmen auf mehreren Ebenen entwickelt. Smarte Echo-Lautsprecher verfügen über eine Mikrofon-aus-Taste, mit der Sie die Stromzufuhr zu den Mikrofonen unterbrechen und sie somit deaktivieren können. Auch über Ihre Sprachaufzeichnungen haben Sie die volle Kontrolle. Sie können diese jederzeit einsehen, anhören oder löschen.<br> <a href="https://www.amazon.de/b/?node=17084415031&amp;ref=aucc_cr_privacy">Mehr über Datenschutz erfahren</a>.</p>

<script>
(function() {
    var performance = window.performance;
    var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;
    if (!isApiSupported) {
        
        return;
    }

    var key = 'content-grid-widget:1.0'
    performance.mark(key + ':be');

    var entry = key + ':clientBodyBeginToEnd';
    performance.measure(entry, key + ':bb', key + ':be');

    var entries = performance.getEntriesByName(entry);
    if (entries.length === 0) {
        return;
    }

    entries = entries.splice(entries.length - 1, 1);
    var duration = entries[0].duration;
    if (window.ue) {
        window.ue.count(entry, duration);
    }
})();
</script></div>

<script>
(function() {
    var performance = window.performance;
    var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;
    if (!isApiSupported) {
        
        return;
    }

    var key = 'mars-device-upgrader-widget:1.0'
    performance.mark(key + ':be');

    var entry = key + ':clientBodyBeginToEnd';
    performance.measure(entry, key + ':bb', key + ':be');

    var entries = performance.getEntriesByName(entry);
    if (entries.length === 0) {
        return;
    }

    entries = entries.splice(entries.length - 1, 1);
    var duration = entries[0].duration;
    if (window.ue) {
        window.ue.count(entry, duration);
    }
})();
</script></div>

<script>
(function() {
var performance = window.performance;
var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;

if (isApiSupported) {
    performance.mark('content-grid-widget:1.0' + ':bb');
} else if (window.ue) {
    window.ue.count('mars:missing-performance-api', 1);
}
})();

<div class="content-grid-block" style=""><h3>Echo Dot (4. Generation)</h3>
</div>

                    </div>

<div id="" class="content-grid-row-wrapper " style="font-size: 13px;margin: 10px auto 0px auto;line-height: 19px;"
    data-lazy-loading-background-image="">
    <div class="a-row">
        
            
            
            
            
            

            
                
                    
                
                
            
            
                
                
                
                
                    <div class="a-column a-span6 block-content block-type-table textalign-left">
                        




<div class="content-grid-block" style="">
    <table class="a-bordered">
        
            <tr>
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td style="width:120px;">
                                <p><strong>Abmessungen</strong></p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td>
                                <p>100 x 100 x 89 mm</p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
            </tr>
        
            <tr>
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td style="width:120px;">
                                <p><strong>Gewicht</strong></p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td>
                                <p>328 Gramm. <i>Die tatsächliche Größe und das Gewicht können abhängig vom Herstellungsprozess abweichen.</i></p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
            </tr>
        
            <tr>
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td style="width:120px;">
                                <p><strong>WLAN-Verbindung</strong></p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td>
                                <p>Dualband-WLAN unterstützt Netzwerke der Standards 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac (2,4 und 5 GHz). Unterstützt keine Verbindungen zu ad-hoc- (oder Peer-to-Peer-) WLAN-Netzen.</p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
            </tr>
        
            <tr>
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td style="width:120px;">
                                <p><strong>Bluetooth-Verbindung</strong></p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td>
                                <p>Unterstützt Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP) für Audiostreaming von Mobilgeräten auf Echo Dot oder von Echo Dot auf Ihren Bluetooth-Lautsprecher. Audio/Video Remote Control Profile (AVRCP) zur Sprachsteuerung von verbundenen Mobilgeräten. Hands-free-Sprachsteuerung wird auf Mac OS X-Geräten nicht unterstützt. Bluetooth-Lautsprecher mit PIN-Eingabe werden nicht unterstützt.</p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
            </tr>
        
            <tr>
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td style="width:120px;">
                                <p><strong>Audio</strong></p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td>
                                <p>41-mm-Lautsprecher; 3,5-mm-Stereoaudioausgang für externe Lautsprecher (Audiokabel nicht inbegriffen)</p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
            </tr>
        
            <tr>
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td style="width:120px;">
                                <p><strong>Systemanforderungen</strong></p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td>
                                <p>Echo Dot kann sofort mit Ihrem WLAN verbunden werden. Die Alexa App ist kompatibel mit Fire OS-, Android- und iOS-Geräten und zudem von Ihrem Webbrowser aus zugänglich.
<a href="https://www.amazon.de/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=GDHB98S32QPQ5H4Y">Unterstützte Betriebssysteme</a>. Bestimmte Skills und Dienstleistungen erfordern möglicherweise ein separates Abo oder andere Gebühren.</p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
            </tr>
        
            <tr>
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td style="width:120px;">
                                <p><strong>Einrichtung</strong></p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td>
                                <p>Mit der einfachen WLAN-Einrichtung von Amazon können Kunden Smart Home-Geräte in nur wenigen leichten Schritten mit ihrem WLAN-Netzwerk verbinden. Die einfache WLAN-Einrichtung ist nur eine der Arten, auf die Alexa ständig dazulernt. Mehr über die <a href="https://www.amazon.de/gp/help/customer/display.html/?nodeId=GMPKVYDBR223TRPY">einfache WLAN-Einrichtung</a> erfahren.</p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
            </tr>
        
    </table>

    
</div>

                    </div>
                
            
        
            
            
            
            
            

            
                
                
                    
                
            
            
                
                
                
                
                    <div class="a-column a-span6 block-content block-type-table textalign-left a-span-last">
                        




<div class="content-grid-block" style="">
    <table class="a-bordered">
        
            <tr>
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td style="width:120px;">
                                <p><strong>Gewährleistung und Service</strong></p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td>
                                <p>Amazon Echo Dot (4. Generation) wird mit einer <a href="https://www.amazon.de/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201014520">beschränkten einjährigen Herstellergarantie</a> verkauft. Diese besteht zusätzlich zu allen jeweils anwendbaren <a href="https://www.amazon.de/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201310960">gesetzlichen Gewährleistungsansprüchen für Verbrauchsgüter</a> und beeinträchtigt diese in keiner Weise. Das bedeutet, dass Ihnen auch nach Ablauf der beschränkten Herstellergarantie immer noch gesetzliche Ansprüche zustehen können. Die Nutzung von Amazon Echo Dot unterliegt den folgenden <a href="https://www.amazon.de/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201566380">Bedingungen</a>.</p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
            </tr>
        
            <tr>
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td style="width:120px;">
                                <p><strong>Barrierefreiheit</strong></p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td>
                                <p>Die Alexa App und Alexa-fähige Produkte umfassen mehrere Funktionen zur Barrierefreiheit für Kunden mit eingeschränktem Seh-, Hör-, Bewegungs- oder Sprachvermögen. Mehr über <a href="https://www.amazon.de/l/21827720031">Alexa und Barrierefreiheit</a> erfahren.</p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
            </tr>
        
            <tr>
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td style="width:120px;">
                                <p><strong>Lieferumfang</strong></p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td>
                                <p>Echo Dot, Netzteil (15 W) weiß und <a href="https://customerdocumentation.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/Alexa+Devices/Echo+Dot+(4th+Generation)/EchoDot_(4th+Generation)_QSG_DE.pdf">Kurzanleitung</a>.</p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
            </tr>
        
            <tr>
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td style="width:120px;">
                                <p><strong>Generation</strong></p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td>
                                <p>Echo Dot, 4. Generation – 2020</p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
            </tr>
        
            <tr>
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td style="width:120px;">
                                <p><strong>Datenschutzfunktionen</strong></p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td>
                                <p>Aktivierungswort-Technologie, Streaming-Indikatoren, Mikrofon-aus-Taste, die Möglichkeit, Sprachaufzeichnungen einzusehen und zu löschen und weitere. Besuchen Sie das <a href="https://www.amazon.de/b/?node=17084415031">Datenschutzportal für Alexa</a>, um herauszufinden, wie Alexa und Echo-Geräte Datenschutz gewährleisten.</p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
            </tr>
        
            <tr>
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td style="width:120px;">
                                <p><strong>Sprache</strong></p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
                    
                        
                        
                        
                            <td>
                                <p>Alexa spricht Englisch, Deutsch, Französisch, Italienisch und Spanisch</p>

                            </td>
                        
                    
                
            </tr>

        P.when("MarsContentGridAccessibilityProcessor").execute(function (ContentGridA11yProcessor) {

<script>
(function() {
    var performance = window.performance;
    var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;
    if (!isApiSupported) {
        
        return;
    }

    var key = 'content-grid-widget:1.0'
    performance.mark(key + ':be');

    var entry = key + ':clientBodyBeginToEnd';
    performance.measure(entry, key + ':bb', key + ':be');

    var entries = performance.getEntriesByName(entry);
    if (entries.length === 0) {
        return;
    }

    entries = entries.splice(entries.length - 1, 1);
    var duration = entries[0].duration;
    if (window.ue) {
        window.ue.count(entry, duration);
    }
})();
</script></div>

<script>
(function() {
var performance = window.performance;
var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;

if (isApiSupported) {
    performance.mark('content-grid-widget:1.0' + ':bb');
} else if (window.ue) {
    window.ue.count('mars:missing-performance-api', 1);
}
})();
</script>

<div class="content-grid-block" style=""><p>Dieses Gerät erhält garantierte Software-Sicherheitsupdates für mindestens vier Jahre, nachdem es zuletzt als Neugerät auf unseren Websites zum Kauf verfügbar war. <a href="https://www.amazon.de/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=GMZQWNQRVENX4GTQ">Erfahren Sie mehr über diese Software-Sicherheitsupdates</a>.     <script>
        P.when("MarsContentGridAccessibilityProcessor").execute(function (ContentGridA11yProcessor) {
            ContentGridA11yProcessor.getInstance().requestProcessMarkup();

<script>
(function() {
    var performance = window.performance;
    var isApiSupported = performance && performance.mark && performance.measure && performance.getEntriesByName;
    if (!isApiSupported) {
        
        return;
    }

    var key = 'content-grid-widget:1.0'
    performance.mark(key + ':be');

    var entry = key + ':clientBodyBeginToEnd';
    performance.measure(entry, key + ':bb', key + ':be');

    var entries = performance.getEntriesByName(entry);
    if (entries.length === 0) {
        return;
    }

    entries = entries.splice(entries.length - 1, 1);
    var duration = entries[0].duration;
    if (window.ue) {
        window.ue.count(entry, duration);
    }
})();
</script></div>

                          <div id="climatePledgeFriendlyBTF_feature_div" class="celwidget" data-feature-name="climatePledgeFriendlyBTF">
                           <div id="climatePledgeFriendly" class="a-section"> <hr aria-hidden="true" class="a-divider-normal"/> <div class="a-section climatePledgeFriendlyDesktopCard">  <div class="a-section a-spacing-large a-spacing-top-small"> <div class="a-fixed-left-grid a-spacing-small"><div class="a-fixed-left-grid-inner" style="padding-left:50px"> <div class="a-fixed-left-grid-col a-col-left" style="width:50px;margin-left:-50px;float:left;"> <img alt="Climate Pledge Friendly" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/111pigi1ylL.png" height="34" width="50"/> </div> <div class="a-fixed-left-grid-col a-col-right" style="padding-left:0%;float:left;"> <div class="a-section climatePledgeFriendlyMarginLeft10px"> <h2 class="a-size-medium a-spacing-top-mini a-color-base a-text-bold" dir="auto"> Climate Pledge Friendly </h2> </div> </div> </div></div> <div class="a-section"> <p class="a-size-base a-color-base" dir="auto"> Climate Pledge Friendly verwendet Nachhaltigkeitszertifikate, um Produkte hervorzuheben, die unser Engagement für den Erhalt der natürlichen Welt unterstützen. Zeit ist vergänglich. <a class="a-link-normal" href="/b?node=22415086031"> <span class="a-declarative" data-action="CPF-BTF-CallToAction" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-CPF-BTF-CallToAction" data-CPF-BTF-CallToAction="{}"> Weitere Informationen </span> </a> </p> </div> </div> <div class="a-section a-spacing-small"> <h3 class="a-size-base a-color-tertiary" dir="auto"> PRODUKTZERTIFIZIERUNG (1) </h3> </div> <div class="a-section">         <div class="a-row a-spacing-large">  <div class="a-column a-span4">         <div class="a-fixed-left-grid"><div class="a-fixed-left-grid-inner" style="padding-left:55px"> <div class="a-fixed-left-grid-col a-col-left" style="width:55px;margin-left:-55px;float:left;"> <span class="a-declarative" data-action="a-modal" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-modal" data-a-modal="{&quot;padding&quot;:&quot;none&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;CPFBottomSheet-Reducing_CO2&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:&quot;800&quot;,&quot;header&quot;:&quot;Reducing CO2&quot;}" id="CPF-BTF-Certificate-Logo-Reducing_CO2"> <a class="a-link-normal" href="#"> <img alt="Reducing CO2" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/61yBK-fg8uL._SS220_.png" height="55" width="55"/> </a> </span> </div> <div class="a-fixed-left-grid-col a-col-right" style="padding-left:0%;float:left;"> <div class="a-section climatePledgeFriendlyMarginLeft21px"> <span class="a-declarative" data-action="a-modal" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-modal" data-a-modal="{&quot;padding&quot;:&quot;none&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;CPFBottomSheet-Reducing_CO2&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:&quot;800&quot;,&quot;header&quot;:&quot;Reducing CO2&quot;}" id="CPF-BTF-Certificate-Name-Reducing_CO2"><a class="a-link-normal" href="#"><span class="a-size-base" dir="auto">Reducing CO2</span></a></span>  steht für Produkte, die ihren CO2-Fußabdruck von Jahr zu Jahr reduzieren. Zertifiziert durch den Carbon Trust.  </div> </div> </div></div> <div class="a-popover-preload" id="a-popover-CPFBottomSheet-Reducing_CO2"> <div class="a-section a-padding-medium"> <div class="a-section"> <p>Die Kennzeichnung „Reducing CO2“ (CO2-Reduzierung) gilt für vom Carbon Trust zertifizierte Produkte, bei denen während des gesamten Lebenszyklus des Produkts daran gearbeitet wird, Jahr für Jahr die Treibhausgasbilanz zu reduzieren. Der Carbon Trust wurde 2001 gegründet und führte 2007 das weltweit erste Carbon Label ein. Er erstellt seine Zertifizierungen nach weltweit führenden und unabhängig geprüften Standards. Der Carbon Trust hat es sich zur Mission gemacht, den Wandel hin zu einer nachhaltigen Wirtschaft mit geringeren Emissionen zu beschleunigen.</p><p><span class="a-declarative" data-action="CPF-OpenExternalLink" data-cpf-openexternallink="{}"><a href="https://www.carbontrust.com/">Weitere Informationen zu dieser Zertifizierung</a></span></p> </div>  </div> </div> </div>  </div>  </div> </div> </div>                            </div>

<div class="a-row a-expander-container a-spacing-top-medium a-expander-inline-container">
    
        
            <a data-csa-c-func-deps="aui-da-a-expander-toggle" data-csa-c-type="widget" data-csa-interaction-events="click" data-hook="cr-ratings-explanation-expand" aria-expanded="false" role="button" href="javascript:void(0)" data-action="a-expander-toggle" class="a-expander-header a-declarative a-expander-inline-header a-link-expander" data-a-expander-toggle="{&quot;allowLinkDefault&quot;:true, &quot;expand_prompt&quot;:&quot;&quot;, &quot;collapse_prompt&quot;:&quot;&quot;}"><i class="a-icon a-icon-expand"></i><span class="a-expander-prompt">
                So funktionieren Kundenrezensionen und -bewertungen
            </span></a>
            <div aria-expanded="false" class="a-expander-content a-expander-inline-content a-expander-inner" style="display:none">
                <p class="a-spacing-top-small">
                    Kundenbewertungen, einschließlich Produkt-Sternebewertungen, helfen Kunden, mehr über das Produkt zu erfahren und zu entscheiden, ob es das richtige Produkt für sie ist.
                </p>
                <p>
                    Um die Gesamtbewertung der Sterne und die prozentuale Aufschlüsselung nach Sternen zu berechnen, verwenden wir keinen einfachen Durchschnitt. Stattdessen berücksichtigt unser System beispielsweise, wie aktuell eine Bewertung ist und ob der Prüfer den Artikel bei Amazon gekauft hat. Es wurden auch Bewertungen analysiert, um die Vertrauenswürdigkeit zu überprüfen.
                </p>
                <a class="a-link-normal" target="_blank" rel="noopener" href="/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_omni_lm_btn?nodeId=G8UYX7LALQC8V9KA">
                    Erfahren Sie mehr darüber, wie Kundenbewertungen bei Amazon funktionieren.
                </a>
            </div>
        
        
    
</div></span>

<div id="cr_customers_image_gallery" data-hook="image-popover" class="a-section cr-lightbox-popover-container cr-lightbox-popover-container--gallery">
